headline: Roku (ROKU) Surges 10.43% on Amazon Deal
summary: Roku, Inc. (NASDAQ:ROKU) is one of the 10 Stocks Post Jaw-Dropping Gains. Roku Inc. grew its share prices by 10.43 percent on Monday to close at $82.17 apiece after clinching a major exclusive advertisement deal with Amazon Ads. In a statement on Monday, Roku, Inc. (NASDAQ:ROKU) said that it partnered with Amazon Ads to offer the largest […]

headline: Disney: The Magic Of Option Collars When Stocks Fly Like Peter Pan

headline: 3 S&P 500 Stocks in the Doghouse
summary: The S&P 500 (^GSPC) is home to the biggest and most well-known companies in the market, making it a go-to index for investors seeking stability. But not all large-cap stocks are created equal - some are struggling with slowing growth, declining margins, or increased competition.
